channel.title: face recognition on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in face recognition on Memo Tut

item.title: Face recognition with Python OpenCV
item.description: #Overview This article is for people who want to perform face recognition with OpenCV of Python. In this article, I will explain how to detect faces from images, camera images, mp4 files, and how to cut and save only faces from images. #environment macOS Catalina 10.15.4 Python 3.7.5 opencv-python 4.2.0.34 numpy 1.18.2 #Install OpenCV $ pip install opencv-python Directory structure . ├── cascades │ └── haarcascade_frontalface_default.xml ├── image_detect.py ├── images │ └── 001.

item.title: [Python] World Champion Mr. Satan Makeover App Made
item.description: #Introduction Everyone’s yearning, world champion “Mr. Satan”. I made an application that can transform into “Mr. Satan”. Wearing the characteristic eyebrows, beard, and afro hair, you are now “Mr. Satan”! Miscellaneous (w)! Technically, the face_recognition library is used to acquire the coordinates of various parts of the face, and the positions and sizes of the eyebrows, whiskers, and afro are calculated and drawn based on them. What is #face_recognition

item.title: I tried face recognition using Face++
item.description: #Execution environment Ubuntu 16.04 Python 3.7 opencv-python 4.1.0.25 #Overview Let’s try face recognition using the API “Face++” developed by China. The procedure is as follows. ** ① Account registration ② Get the API to use ③ Confirmation of demo ④ Program ⑤ Face recognition** ##** ① Account registration** First, you need to register an account to use Face++. Register on the official page and get your **API Key** and **API Secret**.
